Official website of the European Union says the following:"There are some 3 300 higher education establishments in the European Union and approximately 4 000 in Europe as a whole, including the other countries of western Europe and the candidate countries." http://europa.eu/legislation_summaries/education_training_youth/lifelong_learning/c11067_en.htm
